_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four kinds of mindfulness meditation: Meditating by observing an aspect of the body
Meditating by observing an aspect of feelings
Meditating by observing an aspect of the mind
Meditating by observing an aspect of principles
The result of completely understanding e: Realization of the deathless after completely understanding the body
Realization of the deathless after completely understanding feelings
Realization of the deathless after completely understanding the mind
Realization of the deathless after completely understanding principles
